## Repos
1. Your repository is a collection of the work you have done in BIS 15L.  
2. It should be neat, clean, and professional.  
3. You can easily turn it into a webpage (https://docs.github.com/en/pages).  
4. After today, all of our labs will be finished so it's a good time to download.  

## AI
1. Two popular options: GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT.  
2. Copilot is a generative code completion tool that integrates with RStudio.  
3. ChatGPT is a generative AI chatbot that can help you with coding, analysis, and interpretation depending on the model.  

## Discussion
1. Have you used AI?
2. What is generative AI?
3. What is the difference between intelligence and AI?  
4. What are some examples of ethical issues with AI?  
5. Do you think professors can detect AI?  
6. What is your prediction for AI over the next 5 years?
